name: GPT Automator
description: A voice-controlled Mac assistant using Whisper and GPT-3.

name: Buzz
description: A desktop app that transcribes and translates audio offline on your personal computer. Powered by OpenAI's Whisper.

name: Lox Playground
description: A web-based REPL and web editor for running Lox programs. The playground runs Loxjs, a JavaScript implementation of the tree-walking interpreter from Bob Nystrom's Crafting Interpreters.

name: Glox
description: A Go implementation of the Lox interpreter.

name: Expression Evaluator
description: A math expression evaluator built with JavaScript.

name: GitHub Stories
description: A playful Chrome extension for viewing stories on your GitHub dashboard.
